resources.string: This tab displays apps added for auto DND toggle
Tap listed app to enable auto DND toggle for it
Please tap the floating button to finish setup.
Turn on Do Not Disturb automatically whenever using specified apps and turn it off afterwards.
Please allow this app to access/modify notification policy.
Please enable accessibility service to make this app work.
If you\'re on newer Android versions, you might need to go to App Info page and click on \"Allow restricted settings\" in menu to allow the accessibility service of this app to run.
